mapper.select: select cp.*,ms.name,ms.is_mandatory from mil_db.cil_position cp inner join mil_db.mil_subject ms on cp.subject = ms.code order by cp.row_id, cp.col_id;

select cs.subject,cs.page_id from mil_db.cil_position cp inner join mil_db.cil_subjectcore cs on cp.subject = cs.subject where cs.page_id in ('129','130','131','132','133') and cs.type != 'support' and cs.type != ''
AND cp.subject = #{subject}

select sub.subject as main_subject, sub.pre_subject as main_pre_subject, psub.pre_subject as sub_pre_subject from prerequisite_subjects sub join prerequisite_subjects psub on sub.pre_subject = psub.subject
AND sub.subject = #{subject}

select cp.col_id ,cp.row_id ,cp.subject, cs.page_id, cs.type from mil_db.cil_position cp join mil_db.cil_subjectcore cs on cp.subject = cs.subject
AND cs.page_id = #{page_id}
